pages.text: A cake carefully crafted with carrots, containing a copious quantity of carotene. Provides night vision when eaten.
A delightful, delectable dessert deserving decorous devotion. More satisfying than normal cake.
A decoctive delight! Imbues the consumer with the effects of the potion used to bake it.
A satiating, scrumptious sweet synthesized from sadiroot spice. Cleanses negative status effects when eaten.
A plump pumpkin packed with plentiful produce. Incredibly filling and there's just so much of it.
Coagulated cream created by curdling its casein with chymosin. Who doesn't love cheese? Can be split into wedges.
A vast volume of varied vegetables. A classic harvest-time staple, in pie form.
Gluten grouped by gobs of gooey goodness. If there are any flavors which make a better pairing, they have not yet been discovered.
A pepper packed with parmesan paired with prime meat. Incredibly filling and tasty!
Salted seafood surrounded with seaweed and short-grain rice, often served with soy sauce. Nutritious and quick to eat. Don't tell Direwolf20.
Synthesized with the spoils of the spring season, sure to put a spring in your step. Boosts jump height when consumed.
A body-boosting broth brewed with bulbous produce. Buffs maximum health when consumed.
An exhilarating eggplant elixir effervescing with exorbitant experience enhancements. Boosts xp gain when consumed.
